name: Babyyy
greetingText: Did you really think it would be a simple message on Instagram?😏
wishText: Meri pyaari Aji, Mei shaayar toh nahi hu lekin likh leta hu kabhi kabhi kaafi achi, Tumhe jab bhi dekhta hu tab aata hai woh gaana khayalon mei 'Ek ladki ko dekha to aisa laga. Jaise khilta gulaab, jaise shayar ka khwaab', I Love youuuuuuu ˚ʚ♡ɞ˚
